body:
Here are the occurrences of "bad pointer in write barrier" over the past month. I haven't looked at these to see if they look at all related, and the other two were before some memory corruption fixes (8c3533c and cc8f544).

[2015-06-28T21:41:38-d0ed87d/openbsd-amd64-gce56](http://build.golang.org/log/b48ddaba2a9ae1ff9cc537351ae2224330c7c597)
[2015-07-01T16:10:38-596ddf4/nacl-arm-cheney](http://build.golang.org/log/fc0a592e34a983d1c432788dd3d6ddfa36638e7d)
[2015-07-11T07:02:57-d5004ee/freebsd-amd64-gce101](http://build.golang.org/log/aafb6004d46f88ffe84788b31f51d64bcef6d9b1)
